# GolfMCP

A Pythonic framework for building Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers with zero boilerplate.

## Features

* ğŸš€ **Zero-to-live in under 90 seconds**: Quick setup and deployment
* ğŸ’¡ **Convention over configuration**: Minimal boilerplate

* ğŸ“‚ **Nested folder support**: Organize your tools, resources, and prompts
* ğŸ”Œ **Pluggable auth & deploy**: Built-in providers for OAuth, Vercel, Fly.io, etc.
* ğŸ› ï¸ **Delegates protocol compliance to FastMCP**: Focus on your logic, not the wire format

## Installation

```bash
pip install golfmcp
```

## Quick Start

Initialize a new project:

```bash
golf init my-mcp-project
cd my-mcp-project
```

Start the development server with hot-reload:

```bash
golf dev
```

## Documentation

For detailed documentation, visit [docs](https://golfmcp.docs.example.com/).
